title: RocketStack
description: Turborepo template: A fullstack typesafe turborepo template that helps user ship the mvp fast without thinking about the boiler plate code too much, Velocity is the currency for SaaS products

title: Postahead
description: A social media scheduling platform that allows users to schedule posts to their social media accounts, including X, Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, and LinkedIn.

title: OneStopMarketing
description: An AI-powered UGC ad creation platform that enables users to generate and edit videos directly in the browser. Features include AI avatar creation, in-browser video editing with Remotion, and automated social media scheduling across multiple platforms.

title: InvoiceManager
description: An intelligent invoice management system that streamlines payment tracking and client communication. Features include automated payment reminders, customizable email templates via Resend, and comprehensive invoice tracking with expected payment dates.

title: StudioAnimation app
description: A web application that enables users to create and share studio-ready animation videos using the Manim library, with support for both AI-generated and personal voiceovers.

title: FastApi Template
description: A template for building FastAPI applications with a focus on scalability, performance, and maintainability. Features include authentication, database integration, and automated testing.

title: OceanSide
description: A professional podcast recording platform that enables seamless online collaboration. Users connect via WebRTC for real-time audio/video communication, with local recording capabilities and automatic cloud storage to Cloudflare R2. Perfect for remote podcast interviews, team discussions, and content creation.
